top_info.title: Information about how we use cookies to enhance your experience on our website.

lt.title: What Are Cookies?
lt: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device (computer, tablet, or mobile phone) when you visit our website. These files allow the website to recognize your device and store some information about your preferences or past actions.
Cookies are widely used to make websites work more efficiently, as well as to provide information to the website owners about how users interact with the site.

lt.title: How We Use Cookies
lt.p: Santiclinic uses cookies for various purposes, always aiming to enhance your experience on our website and provide personalized services.

1.title: Website Functionality
lt: Keep your session active during browsing
Store form information for your convenience

2.title: Analysis and Improvement
lt: Analyze website traffic and usage patterns
Identify most visited pages and areas of interest

3.title: Marketing and Communication
lt: Display ads relevant to your interests
Measure the effectiveness of our campaigns

lt.title: Types of Cookies
lt.p: We use different types of cookies, each with specific purposes.

lt.title: Necessary Cookies
lt.p: These cookies are essential for the basic functioning of the website. Without them, certain features would not work properly.

lt.title: Analytics Cookies
lt.p: Help us understand how visitors interact with the website, providing information about pages visited, time spent, and other metrics.

lt.title: Marketing Cookies
lt.p: Used to display relevant advertising and measure the effectiveness of our marketing campaigns.

lt.title: Functional Cookies
lt.p: Enable advanced features like live chat, improved forms, and other personalized features.

lt.title: Specific Cookies Used
lt.p: The following table details the specific cookies used on our website.

obj: Identifies your session on the website

1.title: Control Your Preferences
1.p: You can manage your cookie preferences at any time through our cookie banner or by clicking the button below:

2.title: Browser Settings
2.p: Most browsers allow you to control cookies through settings. You can configure your browser to:
lt: Delete cookies when closing the browser

lt.title: Third-Party Cookies
lt.p: Some cookies on our website are set by third-party services. These services have their own privacy policies:

lt.title: Google Analytics
lt.p: Used to analyze website traffic and user behavior.

lt.title: Facebook Pixel
lt.p: Used for targeted advertising and conversion tracking.

lt.title: Google Ads
lt.p: Used for advertising campaigns and remarketing.

lt.title: Impact of Disabling
lt.p: If you choose to disable cookies, some website features may be affected:

lt.title: Necessary Cookies
lt.p: Disabling may cause functionality issues, session loss, and navigation difficulties.

lt.title: Analytics Cookies
lt.p: Disabling does not affect functionality, but limits our ability to improve the website.

lt.title: Marketing Cookies
lt.p: Disabling means you may see less relevant ads based on your interests.

lt.title: Policy Updates
lt: Santiclinic may update this Cookie Policy periodically to reflect changes in our services or applicable legislation.
When we make significant changes, we will notify you via our website and, if applicable, by email. The date of the last update is always indicated at the top of this page.
We recommend reviewing this policy regularly to stay informed about how we use cookies.

lt.title: Contact
lt.p: If you have any questions about this Cookie Policy or about how we use cookies, you can contact us via:
quest: For general questions about privacy and data protection, please refer to our Privacy Policy.

top_info.p: General terms and conditions for the use of Santiclinic's services.

1.title: General Information
p: These Terms and Conditions govern the use of Santiclinic's website and the provision of our cosmetic microsurgery services. By accessing our website or using our services, you fully accept these terms.
Santiclinic reserves the right to amend these terms at any time, with such changes becoming effective upon publication on the website.

3.title: Services Provided
3.p: Santiclinic offers specialized cosmetic microsurgery services, including

3.2.title: Consultations
3.2.p: All treatments are preceded by a mandatory medical consultation to assess the appropriateness of the procedure and clarify any doubts.

4.1.title: Access Conditions
4.1.p: Access to the website is free of charge, but some services may require completing forms or providing personal data.

4.2.title: Prohibited Uses
lt: Using the website for illegal or unauthorized purposes
Attempting to access restricted areas of the system
Reproducing, distributing, or modifying content without authorization
Interfering with the normal functioning of the website

4.3.title: Intellectual Property
4.3.p: All website content, including texts, images, logos, and design, is the property of Santiclinic and is protected by copyright laws.

5.1.title: Booking Consultations
5.1.p: Consultations can be booked through the website, by phone, or via WhatsApp. Confirmation will be sent by email or SMS.

5.2.title: Cancellation Policy
lt: Cancellations must be communicated at least 24 hours in advance
Late cancellations may be subject to fees
No-shows without justification may incur a consultation fee
Rescheduling is allowed based on availability

5.3.title: Delays
5.3.p: If you are more than 15 minutes late, the consultation may be rescheduled to another available time.

6.title: Commercial Terms
6.subtitle: Pricing and Payments
6.1: Prices are listed in euros and include VAT
Prices may change without prior notice
Payment can be made by cash, card, or bank transfer
Some treatments may require advance payment

6.2.title: Quotes
6.2.p: All quotes are valid for 30 days and are subject to confirmation after medical consultation.

6.3.title: Guarantees
6.3.p: Santiclinic guarantees the quality of the services provided in accordance with good medical practices, but does not guarantee specific results.

7.1.title: Santiclinic’s Responsibility
7.1.p: Santiclinic is committed to providing quality services, but its responsibility is limited to direct and verifiable damages.

7.2.title: Client’s Responsibility
lt: Provide truthful and complete medical information
Report any changes in health status

7.3.title: Limitations
7.3.p: Santiclinic is not responsible for results dependent on factors beyond its control, such as individual healing or compliance with medical recommendations.

title.title: Data Protection
p: The processing of your personal data is governed by our
which forms an integral part of these terms and conditions

8.2.title: Data Subject Rights
8.2.p: You may exercise your rights to access, rectify, delete, and other rights under the GDPR by contacting us through the channels provided in the Privacy Policy.

9.1.title: Complaints
9.1.p: Complaints must first be addressed to Santiclinic using the contact details provided on the website.

9.2.title: Mediation
9.2.p: In the event of a dispute, the parties agree to attempt mediation before resorting to the courts.

9.3.title: Applicable Law
9.3.p: These terms are governed by Portuguese law, with jurisdiction belonging to the courts of the district where Santiclinic is headquartered.

10.1.title: Amendments
10.1.p: Santiclinic reserves the right to change these terms at any time, communicating the changes via the website.

10.2.title: Validity
10.2.p: If any provision of these terms is deemed invalid, the remaining provisions shall remain in full force.

10.3.title: Contacts
10.3.p: For questions related to these terms and conditions, you can contact us through:

pp.top_info: Santiclinic is committed to protecting your privacy and personal data.

1.title: General Information
p: This Privacy Policy outlines how Santiclinic collects, uses, stores, and protects users' personal information from our website and cosmetic microsurgery services.
This policy applies to all personal data collected through our website, contact forms, in-person consultations, and any other interactions with Santiclinic.

4.title: Legal Basis for Processing
4.p: The processing of your personal data is based on the following legal grounds:

4.1.title: Consent
4.1.p: For sending marketing communications, newsletters, and use of non-essential cookies, we request your explicit consent.

4.2.title: Contract Execution
4.2.p: For the provision of our medical services, data processing is necessary for the execution of the service contract.

4.3.title: Legitimate Interest
4.3.p: For improving our services, website analysis, and security, we rely on our legitimate interest.

4.4.title: Legal Obligation
4.4.p: Some data is processed to comply with legal obligations, particularly in tax and health matters.

5.title: Data Sharing
5.p: Santiclinic does not sell, rent, or share your personal data with third parties, except in the following situations:

6.title: Data Security
6.p: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal data against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure, or destruction.

6.2.title: Organizational Measures
lt: Restricted data access on a 'need-to-know' basis
Regular staff training on data protection

7.title: Data Retention
7.p: Your personal data is retained only for as long as necessary for the purposes for which it was collected:

7.1.title: Patient Data
7.1.p: Medical data is retained for a minimum of 5 years after the last contact, in accordance with applicable legislation.

7.2.title: Marketing Data
7.2.p: Marketing data is retained until consent is withdrawn or for a maximum period of 3 years without interaction.

7.3.title: Browsing Data
7.3.p: Browsing data is retained for a maximum of 26 months, following CNIL recommendations.

8.title: Your Rights
8.p: Under the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR), you have the following rights:

lt.title: Right of Access
lt.p: You may request information about the data we process about you.

lt.title: Right to Rectification
lt.p: You may request correction of incorrect or incomplete data.

lt.title: Right to Erasure
lt.p: You may request deletion of your personal data.

lt.title: Right to Restriction
lt.p: You may request the restriction of your data processing.

lt.title: Right to Data Portability
lt.p: You may request the transfer of your data to another controller.

lt.title: Right to Object
lt.p: You may object to the processing of your data for marketing purposes.

9.title: Contacts and Exercising Rights
p: To exercise your rights or clarify any questions about this privacy policy, you can contact us:
If you are not satisfied with our response, you have the right to file a complaint with the

10.title: Changes to the Policy
p: Santiclinic reserves the right to amend this Privacy Policy at any time. Changes will be communicated through our website and, if material, via email to data subjects.
We recommend checking this page regularly to stay informed about how we protect your personal data.
